name: Mark of the Ninja: Remastered
description: In Mark of the Ninja, you'll know what it is to truly be a ninja. You must be silent, agile and clever to outwit your opponents in a world of gorgeous scenery and flowing animation.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz processor (E6600) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT720 or AMD Radeon R7770 (1 GB) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
